name: Adronik Hyllus
content:
Adronik Hyllus was a male Human who served as a captain in the reconstituted Sith Empire's Imperial Military. Sometime prior to 3666 BBY, Hyllus married a Human woman native to Jurio after the planet was granted Imperial governance. In 3666 BBY, Hyllus and his wife had a son they named Vector, who grew up during the Imperial reconstruction of Jurio and joined the Imperial Diplomatic Service at an early age.
Adronik Hyllus was first mentioned in the Codex entry for Vector Hyllus, a companion character for the Imperial Agent class in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
